posts.post_title: Fs: $$ ADDITIONAL reductions on remaining cards!!!
posts.post_content:
NEW LOWERED PRICES IN GREEN

Hi!  I really need to sell my graded T206 cards as soon as I can.  I am reducing the prices from what I originally had on the cards.  If you are willing to buy more than one card, I am willing to still go down on pricing.  And I am still willing to consider all fair offers on any of the cards!!!!!  I will cover the shipping charges as well.  Payment must be made through paypal.  If you are interested, please e-mail me at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url].  Thank you for your consideration.  My remaining cards for sale with new prices are (all are SGC graded except for 2 that are PSA graded):
